title: Doom & Doom II Soundtrack - HIGH QUALITY MP3
description:
This is a package of the music from id Software's DooM and DooM II. This package contains two folders so that you can specify if you would like to only download one folder or both. The music is in a high quality mp3 format. I got the music by playing the game and recording the original MIDI format music, then I used sampled instruments to create a mix.

THESE ARE NOT THE ABSOLUTE EXACT FILES, Consider them "cover songs". They have I have simply took the original audio and edited it and exported it as an mp3.

Although they aren't the originals, I still think that they are the best from what I have seen from other torrents. The sound is much higher quality than the originals, and in my personal opinion is sounds more modern and better.

The music is renamed to the original music title. ie. The Music for E1M1 IS NOT called E1M1, or Hanger, but it is called "At Doom's Gate" Because thats what the song itself is called, don't like that? Well rename the files ^_^

PLEASE SEED and other than that enjoy =D

-Techtopia
